 SMaRT is scientific research software. It is not a medical device and should not be considered as such. It does not provide medical advice or diagnoses and is not intended to replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Users should always seek the advice of a doctor or other qualified health provider with any questions they may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on this app. It is the sole responsibility of the user to verify the regulatory requirements for the intended use of the program and to comply with all regulatory requirements required by the applicable laws governing its use. The provision of information through this app does not imply a doctor-patient relationship and should not be construed as such. By downloading and/or using this app or source code, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this disclaimer and agree to be bound by its terms.
 
 SMaRT uses the Hannover Body Template from Till-Ansgar Neubert & Florian Beissner (2019). Hannover Body Template. figshare. Dataset. https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.7637387 under CC BY 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
